allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Add failing test for multi-field variant parsing (TDD)

Test demonstrates the parser bug: comma between fields in Cons(T, List(T))
is being parsed as a third field with name "","".

Expected: 2 fields [Var(""T""), Named(""List"", ...)]
Actual: 3 fields [Var(""T""), Named("",""), Named(""List"", ...)]

Test output:
  assertion failed: Cons should have 2 fields, not 3
  Fields: [Var(""T""), Named { name: "","", args: [] }, Named { name: ""List"", args: [Var(""T"")] }]

This test will pass once the parser is fixed to treat commas as field
separators rather than as type names.

Next: Fix the parser to make this test pass (TDD green phase).")
